channel.title: Homes on Rola Dali
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Rola Dali

item.title: Biography
item.description:
I am a Software Developer and Data Analyst at C3G, probing questions related to human health by building and using bioinformatics tools. Education: Professional Development Certificate in Data Science and Machine Learning McGill University 2018-2019
PhD in NeuroScience & Bioinformatics McGill University 2011-2017
B.Sc in Biochemistry University of Ottawa 2006-2010 Programming Skills: Python: numpy, pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, ggplot2, plotly, sklearn, Keras, jupyter notebooks

item.title: Publications
item.description: RobusTAD: A Tool for Robust Annotation of Topologically Associating Domain Boundaries. BiorXiv 2018. Rola Dali, Guillaume Bourque, Mathieu Blanchette Characterization of a FOXG1:TLE1 transcriptional network in glioblastoma-initiating cells. Molecular Oncology 2018. Rola Dali, Federica Verginelli, Albena Pramatarova, Robert Sladek, Stefano Stifani A critical assessment of topologically associating domain prediction tools. Nucleic Acids Research 2017. Rola Dali, Mathieu Blanchette Transcriptional regulation of mouse hypoglossal motor neuron somatotopic map formation.

item.title: Blog
item.description: I keep notes and tutorials in Computer Science, Data Science and various topics. Check it out at: Food4Thought: Journals of a meandering mind
